Let's fill in the remaining details:

* For PetPal, what is the point threshold to reach the Silver Tier, and are there any other rewards or benefits at this tier?

As you earn more points or redeem rewards, feel free to update the table accordingly. This will help you keep track of your progress and plan your redemptions strategically.
